name: Getting it Together
description:
Finish assembling your robot to find a way escape the factory!

Made in 48 hours for the University of Utah's GameCraft Club 2021 Summer Game Jam. The theme was "unfinished."

Credits:

Evan Alley: Design and Sound Effects

Isaac White: Engineering

James Fullmer: Engineering

Julian Liechty: Production, Art, Music

Logan Pu: Art
